Description.0: These ships are built a round a 'Flying Saucer' main hull with a large forward 'head' section.
Description.1: these ships feature 4 deployable weapon pods, two mounted below the forward head section and two on the edge of the saucer section.
Description.2: the rear of the ship is squared off inorder to house the four main engines.
Description.3: Think juptier 2 from the modern lost in space.
